title: Webinar (new features) thoughts?
text:
I registered and watched the webinar advertised to take place on Aug 27. It takes 53min if you haven't done so yet. If you only care about M*.com you could stop in the first 1/3, but to understand where M* is headed, and likely premium, you may want to spend the extra minutes. It is pretty clear the 1-pager pdf isn't coming back to M*.com premium.

The webinar has examples of mainly what Morningstar Advisor Workstation does for you and that's why I'm saying the 1-pager pdf isn't coming back. The "FINRA-audited" examples of the new similar 1-pager is 10 pages long, a lesser, but different first page and 9 pages of compliance, glossary, and the typical YMMV language. The fund vs fund new report shows 1/2 page of 2 funds on page 1 and 2, and then 8 more pages of compliance, glossary, and small print.

I can see the benefit for M* advisor workstation and they dodged a question about cost. From filings we know 180k+ users generate $90M of revenue so it's $500ish. Volume discounts apply and it needs to cost around $2k (guess) to fit below the new $5k Office and $11k M* Direct subscriptions.

They confirmed that featuers that used to be in M*.com are all in Advisor Workstation. Answers to other questions were fairly half-hearted. The good news is I don't have to ask any more hard questions of them. They've got bigger fish to fry.

I dawned on me that premium members are about as important to them as the apple pie is to McD's. Advisors, Brokers, and Money Managers are the burgers, fries, AND drinks.
